 An equality theorem for substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof modified by Jim Kingdon, 1-Feb-2018.)
statement: sbequi $p |- ( x = y -> ( [ x / z ] ph -> [ y / z ] ph ) ) $.
